author: radup
msg: Fix for XMLBEANS-177. Added a setSaveSubstituteCharacters() option to XmlOptions. This enables characters to be replaced during ouptut by their hex, decimal or predefined-entity escapes.
Contributed by Roger Weber and Lawrence Jones

author: rwatler
msg: cleanup short title defaulting for standard menus

author: cutting
msg: Recommend primes, as keys are hashed into number of reduce tasks, and
number of map tasks is sometimes used as number of reduce tasks.  Primes
